title: Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety       911! Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park is located primarily within the town of Skagway, Alaska.  While in town, in the case of an emergency, dial 911.  Please note that while Skagway does have a medical clinic,  there are NO doctors on staff.  The nearest hospital is a mediflight to Juneau 90 miles south. If you are planning to explore more remote sections of the park, such as the Chilkoot Trail, cell phone and GPS coverage are limited.  Be prepared and travel with appropriate gear.  Extra layers, rain gear, and a first aid kit are always a good idea.  Review trail maps at each stop and locate the nearest Ranger or Warden station in case you need assistance along your hike.
